item.title: Weekly Review #04 - Vacation, Family Bonds and Sense of Belonging in Cities
item.description: 'Here, After Us - Mayday' Preface This piece is a record and reflection of my life from July 11, 2022 to July 24, 2022. As for the reason for the delay - I was on vacation!!! Vacation Including my internship, I’ve been working for over a year now, but because projects have been ongoing, I’ve had hardly any complete holidays except for the Spring Festival, and I’ve accumulated quite a few compensatory days off.
